body_html:
so your claim is that because the:

log_perp_list.append(crossent * weights[i])

exists, which scales the cross entropy loss, it will automatically scale the gradients? cool! didn't know TF was so smart, I thought the backprop starts off at the softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits OP.

thanks! : )

body:
so your claim is that because the:

  log_perp_list.append(crossent \* weights[i])

exists, which scales the cross entropy loss, it will automatically scale the gradients? cool! didn't know TF was so smart, I thought the backprop starts off at the softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits OP.

thanks! : )
